item.title: General Relativity (I)
item.description: Time is an illusion. - Albert Einstein Aim of this course (teaching in English) : We will cover the idea of spacetime and Einstein’s special and general theory of relativity, emphasizing the physical intuitions. time: Monday 13:20 - 16:20 (18 weeks; calendar) location: F102 scoring: homework (30%) + mid-term exam (30%; week 9) + final exam (30%; week 18) + class involvement (5%) + others (5%)
